import React, { useState } from 'react' import insta from '../../assets/insta.svg' import facebook from '../../assets/facebook.svg' import upgrade from '../../assets/upgrade.svg' import openSidebar from '../../assets/openSidebar.png' import closeSidebar from '../../assets/closeSidebar.png' import './Sidebar.css' const Sidebar = ({ setValue, setMessage, setCurrentTitle, uniqueTitles}) => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(true); const toggleSidebar = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen); }; const createNewChat = () => { setMessage(null) setValue("") setCurrentTitle(null) }; return ( <>
    {uniqueTitles?.map((uniqueTitle, index) =>
  • {uniqueTitle}
    • )}
Instagram
FaceBook
UpGrade To ChatPro
) } export default Sidebar
